event_description:
Valera Artyukhov's solo concert at Shaman Lounge Bar!

 For the first time in Phuket! On December 11th, Valera Artyukhov will perform on the Shaman Lounge stage. He is a popular stand-up comedian, a resident of the comedy show "Stand Up" on TNT, a participant and writer of the show "Prozharka," a participant in the project "Bolshoy Show" with Azamat Musagaliev, and a participant in "Open Mic" (TNT).

 The comedian admits: "Generally, I adhere to the rule that comedy should be 50/50. Not super alternative, but also not pop, where you joke about old, tired topics we've all heard somewhere before. But most importantly, I enjoy not the edgy jokes, but the moments when the audience laughs at them. And I enjoy the process itself, finding that fine line where the audience laughs, even though they know it's still edgy, but they embrace it. I want it to be humorous, not offensive."

 Thursday evening promises to be truly hilarious. Don't miss this exciting event!

 The Shaman Lounge stage will once again feature powerful hits from Hans Zimmer, A-ha, Avici, Alan Walker, and many others. If you want to be part of this incredible show, hurryâ€”tickets are selling like hotcakes ğŸ”¥

Till Lindemann is a German musician, songwriter, poet, and actor. He is best known as the lead vocalist of the industrial metal group Rammstein. In December 2025 Till Lindemann will grant audiences an insight into the depths of his world! Fans can look forward to raw and completely reconceptualized big show on his solo â€œMeine Weltâ€ tour in Lotus Arena on Phuket!

event_name: The Knyazz group with your favorite KiSh hits!
event_description:
Andrey Knyazev and the band "Knyazz" are returning with a big themed concert dedicated to the legendary "King and the Jester!"

 The "Make Yourself at Home, Traveler" program is a true punk fairy tale and a journey through time: from the first scary stories to folk rock anthems that we sing together!
 Lively action, beloved stories, and the very spirit of "The King and the Jester" - all this is already on January 8 in Phuket!

 Come, sing, jump, make yourself at home, Traveler!

event_name: KINO Group | "The History of This World"
event_description:
For the first time in Phuket! KINO performs "The History of This World" on the Lotus Arena stage.

 Yuri Kasparyan, Alexander Titov, Igor Tikhomirov and the real voice of Viktor Tsoi.

 After their reunion, KINO toured from Sakhalin to Kaliningrad, playing to sold-out houses. And now, their hits "Star Named Sun," "Kukushka," "Peremen," and many others will be performed for the first time on the Lotus Arena stage in Phuket!

event_name: Valery Meladze on the island of Phuket
event_description:
Following the resounding success and sold-out crowds that Valeriy Meladze played to during his 2025 anniversary tour, one of the most popular contemporary performers is embarking on his first tour of Asia's most prestigious concert halls!

 The 2026 tour is filled with fresh emotions, even more emotional and heartfelt lyrics, not only to beloved hits familiar to millions, but also to new songs. The premiere of new compositions, a high-tech light show, an atmosphere that has already become legendary, and, of course, the unique voice of Valery Meladze.

 Each concert by the inimitable Valery Meladze is a unique, heartfelt story, during which the artist gives 100%, charging his audience with incredibly powerful energy and immersing himself in it.
